item.title: Say Hello to the 2025 Ig Nobel Prize Winners
item.description: The annual award ceremony features miniature operas, scientific demos, and 24/7 lectures.

item.title: How to Brush Your Pet's Teeth—Veterinarians Weigh In (2025)
item.description: We talked to pet experts to find out if brushing is just a pet influencer craze, what products to use for oral health, and how to brush safely without losing a finger.

item.title: How to Brush Your Pet's Teeth—Veterinarians Weigh In (2025)

item.title: Government Staffing Cuts Have Fueled an Ant-Smuggling Boom
item.description: “It’s getting out of hand,” one seller says. “They realize the US market is a gold mine.”

item.title: An Ancient Penis Worm With Rings of Sharp Teeth Has Been Discovered in the Grand Canyon
item.description: The 500-million-year-old fossil, containing a species named in honor of the krayt dragons in Star Wars, is a much larger ancestor of phallic marine worms that can be found on the seabed today.

item.description: The 500-million-year-old fossil, containing a species named in honor of the krayt dragons in Star Wars, is a much larger ancestor of phallic marine worms that can be found on the seabed today.

item.title: The case of the coke-snorting Chihuahua
item.description: Cocaine normally makes the heart race, but in this case the dog was lethargic, with a slower heart rate.

item.title: Cockatoos know 30 distinct dance moves
item.description: Ten of 21 known cockatoo species exhibit dance behavior, and one bird executed 17 unique moves.
